segments.text: I can't look away from this; the boy's stool is tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so high up, reaching for those cookies with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it falls, he'll crash right into the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is spreading, making everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there but turned away, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might slip too if she steps back suddenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's close by; she could get hurt in a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet with the jar— one push and it all tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage to the cabinets looks bad already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view makes the inside dangers stand out more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm terrified something awful is about to happen here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids don't realize how risky this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet still running— no one to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heart pounding just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let it all be okay somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR
